title: Cardi B reported to police after 'fan hit by microphone rapper threw into crowd'
description: A woman who says she was hit by a microphone that Cardi B hurled into the crowd at a Las Vegas concert has filed a police report for battery, authorities said.

title: British mother-of-10 among three killed in France motorway crash - reports
description: A British woman is among three people killed in a major car crash on a motorway in northern France.

title: Zelenskyy warns war is coming to Russia - as Putin teases path to 'peace'
description: Volodymyr Zelenskyy says war is coming to Russia after suspected Ukrainian drones hit skyscrapers in a wealthy Moscow neighbourhood.

title: Zoo denies its bears are humans in costume
description: A zoo in China has denied suggestions some of its bears might be people in costumes after photos of the animals standing like humans circulated online.

title: Music declared immoral in Afghanistan by Taliban
description: Musical instruments have been thrown on a bonfire in Afghanistan, with the ruling Taliban government declaring music is immoral.

title: Toppled Niger government encouraged French strikes to free president, junta claims
description: Niger's military junta, which has overthrown the country's elected leader, has claimed the ousted government authorised France to carry out strikes to free the president.

title: Heroic Stuart Broad takes winning wicket in last match as England beat Australia in final Ashes Test
description: England have won the final Ashes Test match after a thrilling finish to draw the series with Australia.

title: FIFA president returns to Women's World Cup after almost a week away on Pacific islands
description: FIFA President Gianni Infantino has returned to the Women's World Cup after almost a week away - to make his first appearance of the tournament in Australia.

title: Niger joins list of Sahel African countries to experience military coups
description: Niger is the latest country in the Sahel region of northwest Africa to experience a military coup.

title: 'I wish I could find words': British expat guilty of wife's mercy killing overwhelmed as he walks free
description: David Hunter, the British pensioner who killed his terminally ill wife in Cyprus, has been sentenced to two years after he was found guilty of manslaughter.

title: 'Doomsday mom' jailed over deaths of two of her children and husband's ex-wife
description: A woman dubbed the "doomsday mom" has been jailed for life without the possibility of parole for the murders of two of her children and conspiring to kill her husband's ex-wife.
